posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Keyworoâ€™s Blog! This is my very first post. Tonight I first try to build my own Blog. I used Git, Node.js, Hexo, Github Pages in this process. If you get any problems, you can Contact me for more info. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
